Enemy butterfly-wing bomber, perfectly symmetric wing design, ornate metal wing patterns, central body with weapon pods, pre-rendered 3D sprite, glossy metallic wings with battle damage, dramatic rim lighting on wing edges, top-down view, isolated on white background, game asset, 1024x1024
